metadata.feature_description: Provides multi-language support for search crawler administration.

steps.action: Navigated to Admin > Site Settings > Search tab
steps.expected: Search settings page should display with localized text labels
steps.actual: Search settings page loaded successfully with all UI text displayed in English. Tabs visible: 'Basic Settings', 'Synonyms', 'Ignore Words', 'Crawling', 'File Extensions'. Field labels displayed correctly: 'Minimum Word Length', 'Maximum Word Length', 'Maximum Result Per Page', 'Custom Analyzer Type', etc.

steps.action: Verified localized labels in Basic Settings tab
steps.expected: All UI labels should be properly localized and readable
steps.actual: Confirmed localized text displayed correctly including section headers ('SEARCH PRIORITIES', 'SEARCH INDEX'), field labels ('Title Boost', 'Tag Boost', 'Content Boost', 'Description Boost', 'Author Boost'), and button text ('Compact Index', 'Re-index Content', 'Re-index Host Content')

steps.action: Clicked on Crawling tab to verify more localized text
steps.expected: Crawling tab should display with localized section headers and column labels
steps.actual: Crawling tab loaded successfully showing localized text: 'URL PATHS' section with column headers 'URL', 'ENABLE SPIDERING', 'DNN IMPERSONATION', 'WINDOWS AUTH'. Also 'Duplicates' section with 'Description' and 'Regex Pattern' headers. 'Included Directories' and 'Excluded Directories' sections visible with '+ Add Directory' buttons.

steps.action: Clicked on File Extensions tab to verify additional localized text
steps.expected: File Extensions tab should display with localized section headers and column labels
steps.actual: File Extensions tab loaded successfully showing localized text: 'INCLUDED FILE EXTENSIONS' section with column headers 'FILE EXTENSION', 'FILE TYPE', 'CONTENT CRAWLING'. 'EXCLUDED FILE EXTENSIONS' section visible. '+ Add File Type' buttons displayed correctly.

observations: The localization framework uses DNN's built-in Localization.GetString() method via LocalizationHelper.cs
Resource files (SharedResources.resx, SearchSpiderSettings.ascx.resx) contain English strings for UI labels, error messages, and log messages
Multiple languages are supported in the DNN site (English and Spanish visible in language selector), but Search Crawler specific translations for Spanish were not available to test

The LocalizationHelper class references 'DesktopModules/DNNCorp/SearchCrawler/App_LocalResources/CrawlerSettings.ascx.resx' for resource file loading, though actual resource files are in the SearchSpider module folder
